name: Commando Finest Hour
description:
My game for Ludum Dare #31, Entire Game on One Screen !

/!\ See compo entry and vote here : compo entry

Controls :

- M to stop music
- Use arrow keys to move
- Mouse to aim
- Left clic to shoot
- Right clic to close dialog
- Escape to quit

I hope you'll enjoy playing the game as much as I making it, and see you at next LD for still better games !
